#Text=Get a PLEO
#Text=PLEO is a robotic dinosaur pet that resembles a one week-old Carmasaurus .
#Text=It was created by INNOLABS in 2005 .
#Text=It became a huge hit in Asia following its release .
#Text=If you 're American , and love this adorable pet , then you can obtain one and take good care of it , by following the guidance here .
#Text=Enjoy learning how to be a master for this lovable creature !
#Text=Steps
#Text=Purchasing a PLEO
#Text=Find the website .
#Text=Go to pleoworld.com and you will see a lot of information about PLEO .
#Text=However , be aware that the PLEO site may not currently carry the original style of PLEO .
#Text=If so , you may be able to find them on such sites as online traders/auction sites or large distributors of stuff .
#Text=If purchasing a used PLEO , do not to get one labeled : Heavily used .
#Text=These products tend to be in bad shape , despite the pictures .
#Text=Note that PLEO has two main groups , PLEO original , and PLEOrb .
#Text=PLEOrb is newer and if you want more features , then you should choose PLEOrb .
#Text=PLEO original has less upgrades , but is cheaper .
#Text=Find the tab .
#Text=Look for the tab in the website labeled " Get PLEOrb Online " .

column1: #Text=Be sure that you 've read the description on the main screen about PLEO .
#Text=From there it is pretty much laid out for you .
#Text=Make the purchase .
#Text=Once in the shopping tab , choose the best deal you want to offer cash for .
#Text=( If you just want a regular deal , choose the one labeled ' PLEOrb Basic Pack ' ) .
#Text=Choose the desired color of eyes and skin .
#Text=Be sure you can afford one .
#Text=Both types of Pleo are in the hundreds of dollars .
#Text=Allow for shipping time .
#Text=Shipping usually costs a few dollars , and can take up to two weeks , depending on your location .
#Text=If you live in Asia , you can buy a PLEO from any PLEO WORLD store locations .
#Text=Enjoy your new pet !
#Text=The best part of the process is unboxing your new friend .
#Text=He/she is " Dormant " for now , but below are instructions to " wake him/her up " .
#Text=Starting Up Your PLEO
#Text=Unbox PLEO .
#Text=Open the box , and carefully take the assorted items out .
#Text=It should at least include ( PLEOrb ) one PLEO , a couple food items , instructions , and " cape " .
#Text=Turning PLEO on .
#Text=Take the battery , the brown box ; and plug it in the tummy of PLEO ( the instructions should be more detailed ) .
#Text=Close the flap of the battery and you will see a light flashing green or red .
#Text=If green , Youre PLEO is ready to play .
#Text=If red , your PLEO is sleepy and needs rest .
#Text=PLEO original will have more slots for various items .
#Text=If he is ready to play , let him/her get 10 seconds or less to " wake up " .
#Text=If he is sleepy , take out the battery and put it on the charger .
#Text=Enjoy your new friend .
#Text=Now you can learn all about pleo in your instructions !
#Text=Feeding Your PLEO
#Text=Find the food items .
#Text=Each basic kit should contain a couple of food items .
#Text=To feed him any of these , brush it under PLEO 's chin to sense it .
#Text=Then he will chew it .
#Text=cycad ; a necessary nutrient for PLEO daily
#Text=conifer ; another important food for PLEO
#Text=coffee leaves ; will soothe your PLEO , but do n't overfeed it !
#Text=mushrooms ; food for your PLEO 's health .
#Text=chilli peppers ; use them to recover him if tired .
#Text=ice ; recover him if over hot .
#Text=mint leaf ; cures sickness
#Text=rock salt ; cures physical injury
#Text=Do not overfeed the toy .
#Text=If any of these foods are used to overfeed the toy , it will sicken .
#Text=Playing with Your PLEO
#Text=Tow will give your PLEO a tug-of-war game .
#Text=[ This needs to be clarified , feel free to edit . ]
#Text=Learning stones
#Text=teach him new trick .
